sources.title: AI Translators - Free Video & Audio Translation Tools | ScreenApp
sources.snippet: Free AI translators for videos, audio files, and podcasts. Translate content to 50+ languages instantly. Video dubbing and localization tools.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Top Options (Free + Paid): ScreenApp – Upload videos or YouTube links and get automatic transcripts, translated subtitles, and dubbing in English and 50+ languages. Works on desktop and mobile. ScreenApp
Veed.io – Easy web editor that transcribes and translates videos into English with subtitles. Great for social media clips. unite.ai
Fliki Video Translator – AI-driven tool that translates video audio and subtitles into 80+ languages, with natural-sounding voiceovers. unite.ai
Dubverse – Simple interface for translating video content and adding English voiceovers or subtitles quickly. Dubverse.ai
Descript – Combines editing + AI translation, so you can tweak transcripts and output accurate English versions. D-ID
Other Useful Tools: Immersive Translate (Chrome extension/web) – Translate videos (like YouTube) into English by generating subtitles you can play inline. Immersive Translate
